pages.text: "A machine that directs the neutron radiation of the sun into its internal reservoir, allowing the slow creation of various isotopes."$(p)The Solar Neutron Activator (SNA) converts chemicals to a new chemical by utilizing sunlight. If a solid block is placed directly above the SNA, the SNA will not function. You

may place transparent blocks like glass above the SNA and that will be fine.$(p)Though there is no visible port, you input chemicals from the bottom of the SNA. The only visible port is the output port.
